resources.string: The backup file for restoration is selected here.\n\nATTENTION The plug-in does not check whether the version of the backup file matches the installed Admidio version. Restoring an unsuitable version can cause Admidio to crash.
This plugin restores the Admidio database.
In order to read all data cleanly again, you will be logged out of the current session when you click the button.
The authorization check of the plugin failed. No menu item could be clearly identified with this URL.\n\n=> #VAR1_BOLD#
The recovery process ended with the following errors:\n\n
The recovery process is in progress.\n\nATTENTION: This process must not be canceled.
